title: Temptation Deep
description: Having my best friend's daughter walk in while another woman was on her knees pleasuring me isn’t something I planned. Quinn watches me finish. Without shame, I hold her gaze and never look away.Now, all I can think about is Quinn and how easy it would be to give in to temptation. She wants me more than anyone has ever wanted me. She's gorgeous, intelligent, and young. She also has a zest for life that I've somehow let pass me by.As her boss, I see her every day. My resistance is slipping.I’m a good man.But even good men have their faults.Quinn will be mine.
author: Ashley Bostock
